Case.GET_L_SURFACE_PERCENT: (A:ELEVATOR DEFLECTION PCT, Percent) 100 + 2 / (A:AILERON LEFT DEFLECTION PCT, Percent) -1 * 0.2 * + 0 max 100 min
Case.GET_R_SURFACE_PERCENT: (A:ELEVATOR DEFLECTION PCT, Percent) 100 + 2 / (A:AILERON RIGHT DEFLECTION PCT, Percent) 0.2 * + 0 max 100 min

Parameters.SIMVAR_YOKE_X_WITH_AP: YOKE X POSITION WITH AP LINEAR

ParametersFn.Name: ASOBO_Move_Interpolation_Helper
ParametersFn.ReturnParameters:
<#OUT_PARAM_NAME#>
				#START_VALUE# sp1 #END_VALUE# sp2 l1 l2 != if{
					l2 l1 - sign s0 #COEFFICIENT# * l1 + sp3 
					l0 0 > if{ l3 l2 min sp0 } els{ l3 l2 max sp0 } l0 #SET_NEW_VALUE#
				} 
			</#OUT_PARAM_NAME#>
